Anyone having problems, delete 'BOOTSTRAP' folder from installation directory. More than that and updating all those drivers, you can't really do much. Better buy MW3 now that it's out, rather than run around with dozens of problems with a crack.

You have to go to the thing where you can pick a lobby out of a list of lobbies. The menu where people name the lobbies.
To get the cracked lobbies to show up you have to refresh the list then a bunch of lobbies will show up.
Pick one :)
